DOC.brief_summary: The main objective evaluate middle term compliance ( ≥ 2 year ) Mandibular Advancement Devices Tali® patient Syndrome Obstructive Sleep Apnea Hypopneas .
DOC.brief_title: Mandibular Advancement Devices Tali® Patients With Syndrome Obstructive Sleep Apnea Hypopneas
DOC.criteria: Patients > 18 year treat Mandibular Advancement Device Tali® least 2 year late 5 year . Patients agree participate study .
